description: This file contains authentication service functions for user registration, login, session handling via cookies, and logout using Supabase. It facilitates user authentication workflows in a frontend application.

methods.name: registerUser
methods.description: Registers a new user with email and password using Supabase authentication.

methods.name: setCookie
methods.description: Sets a cookie with specified name, value, and maximum age, used internally for session management.

methods.name: deleteCookie
methods.description: Deletes a cookie by setting its max-age to zero, used internally for session cleanup.

methods.name: loginUser
methods.description: Logs in a user with email and password, and sets session cookies on success.

methods.name: loginUserWithDetails
methods.description: Logs in a user and fetches their profile details to initialize app state.

methods.name: logoutUser
methods.description: Logs out the current user and clears session cookies.

ctags.name: data
ctags.pattern: /^    const { data, error } = await supabase.auth.signInWithPassword({ email, password });$/

ctags.name: data
ctags.pattern: /^    const { data, error } = await supabase.auth.signUp({ email, password })$/

ctags.name: error
ctags.pattern: /^    const { data, error } = await supabase.auth.signInWithPassword({ email, password });$/

ctags.name: error
ctags.pattern: /^    const { data, error } = await supabase.auth.signUp({ email, password })$/

ctags.name: loginUser
ctags.pattern: /^export const loginUser = async (email: string, password: string) => {$/

ctags.name: loginUserWithDetails
ctags.pattern: /^export const loginUserWithDetails = async (email: string, password: string) => {$/

ctags.name: registerUser
ctags.pattern: /^export const registerUser = async (email: string, password: string) => {$/

ctags.name: setCookie
ctags.pattern: /^const setCookie = (name: string, value: string, maxAge: number) => {$/
